Subject: Re: Where did I come from? Why am I here?

To help, you can think of G1/G2 As the original cartoon with elements
of the comic thrown for spice.

Then you have Beast Wars and then Neo Beast Wars and then you have our
RPG as a basic time line.

TF: Prime and Armada would be other things that are thrown in for
spice with the toon in the toon taking presidence.

So if Tuscon was alive during the time of the cartoon Optimus Prime,
Prowl and Jazz and such that would make him quite old. However if you
are drawing from Animated versions of Prowl and Jazz and Prime, then
we can make some alterattions. Perhaps they are from a later version?
I am trying to get a feel for them.

Which toon is the inspiration for your characters of Tuscon,
Nightshift and Straight Shot?

- preston

On 8/25/11, Sandy <magicquartz@...> wrote:
> That's an interesting question.
>
> I would probably say, Tucson is G2, due to the fact that he's quite a bit
> younger than Leo Prime.  That also includes his sister, Straight Shot, who
> probably were transported off Cybertron and near Atlantis so is to allow
> them ample time to recover from near traumatic injuries.  Tucson was taken
> off line after he got pegged by Cyclonus and was in some sort of Stasis lock
> for a couple of vorns.  Then he travels to Ancient Earth with Perseus.
>
> Nightshift is also G2, how he got to Ancient Earth was probably due to the
> fact that as a pretender, he had connections even with Decepticon forces,
> and somehow hitched a ride with them, ending up on Ancient Earth.
> Nightshift is definitely built with a vehicle alt form, and he finds it hard
> to adapt, but does the best he can under his circumbstances.
>
> That's the best I can think of for now.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>>
>> Here is are interesting questions for each of our characters. So many
>> of us I think have created characters on the fly and have inserted
>> them in the game or perhaps have been given the character by someone
>> else, and the history is sparse.
>>
>> However I would think that after all this time it is safe to assume
>> that no matter how we got the character, these characters are
>> completely ours now. So now we can create, reboot or whatever our
>> character's history so that they chime in with our portrayals of them.
>>
>> So!
>>
>> Did your character come from G1/G2 time frame and some how appear
>> here, did they live through the great war and transport to old Earth
>> from the future Beast Wars time frame or were they constructed
>> somewhere else?
>>
>> If they did have a vehicular alt mode, why have they maintained it on
>> Ancient Earth where there are no roads?
>>
>>
>> All questions to ask ourselves about our characters. These are all
>> ways we can expand our knowledge of the characters we play - whether
>> we created them or given to us, and I look forward to the answers.
>>
>> - Preston
>>
>
>
>
